*sigh* ;)

First off, (directed at LN) Airly is correct in saying that you cannot post anything that controls other people's characters (it even says so in the rules). 

Only Blacknightmare's owner can say what Blacknightmare is feeling. 

Only Blacknightmare's owner can say what Blacknightmare is doing. I understand that you've got some sort of control over BN, but posting outright what BN does is going to be rejected. 

Remember that even if you wish to possess BN, there is the possibilty that BN can resist, no matter how "advanced" you say your technology is. The NBWRPG is more designed to be a story, so work out the story line with Airly. It is obvious that she doesn't want BN to have an elongated stay with the infecticons, so work why don't you talk with Airly, and find out what would work best for both BN and the Infecticons.

[Airly's IDEA] -----> [FINAL IDEA] <----- [LegendaryNemasis's IDEA]

The above is a simple text picture to illustrate a solution that would accomodate both sides of the general though. =)

The "disks" storyline will be interesting, but make sure you talk to people to get a general idea of what will happen. (i'm not saying give away the whole plot, just understand that if something is going to happen, it would be nice to see if flow smoothly.)

Unfortunately, I cannot use my <rauq@...> address anymore, so if you wish to contact me, my current address (until i get a better one) is <rauq@...>. 

Now, it is 2:30am, and the effects of the excellent carbonated beverage (to avoid possible confusion) Coke, are starting to wear off, so *yawn* good night. =)

rAuq
